EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Greenplum Summit_NYC_Q119.GP Summit - 2/19/19
EmailTemplate.subject: Five Reasons to Attend Greenplum Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit?utm_source=pivotal-email-3&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-summit-2019]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Greenplum Summit <[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit?utm_source=pivotal-email-3&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=greenplum-summit-2019]]> at PostgresConf <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019]]> is coming up on March 19 in New York City! Come for the summit, and stay for a great week of learning, networking, and fun.
-
The Networking: Greenplum Summit and PostgresConf will be the largest gathering of Greenplum and Postgres experts in the world! Meet, mingle, and learn in the city that never sleeps.
-
The Sessions: Your peers will share their wisdom through use case presentations and deep-dive tutorials. Learn from Morgan Stanley, Insurance Australia Group, The European Space Agency, Baker Hughes, Conversant Media, Pivotal architects and data scientists, and more. Check out the complete Greenplum Summit agenda now <[[https://pivotal.io/event/greenplum-summit#agenda]]>.
-
The Pre-conference Training: Get hands-on in our three-hour Greenplum Database training session <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/program/proposals/petabyte-scale-data-warehousing-with-open-source-greenplum-database-daf8fb29-80d5-4cf7-969c-0d6535a2b3e4]]> on Monday, March 18.
-
The Keynotes: Hear from the brightest minds shaping the future of advanced data technologies, including luminaries from AWS, Google, Microsoft and Pivotal.
- The Demos: Visit the exhibit hall to see live demos and get all your deepest technical questions about Greenplum Database answered by our team of practitioners. (and pick up some swag while you’re there too!)
Save 25% off your conference pass A single pass gives you full access to both PostgresConf and Greenplum Summit. Get a 25% discount on PostgresConf registration <[[https://postgresconf.org/conferences/2019/buytickets]]> with promo code “2019_GREENPLUM”. The discount applies to all pass types, including the Day Pass. Stay connected Join the conversation on Twitter! Follow @PivotalData <[[https://twitter.com/PivotalData]]> and @Greenplum <[[https://twitter.com/Greenplum]]> and #ScaleMatters <[[https://twitter.com/search?src=typd&q=%23ScaleMatters]]> for all the news and updates. Join me <[[https://twitter.com/jstok]]>, Pivotal’s Head of Data, on Twitter and earn free stuff before you even arrive!
I hope to see you there, Jacque
